AUTHOR = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT c.SGIN_TIME ,c.CREATOR,c.TITLE ,p.ALL_PATH as allpath from cp_pic_group c ,cp_pic_allpath p where c.COVER_PICTURE_ID=p.TRAGET_ID and p.PIC_TYPE=1
c.id =#{id}
mapper.update: update cp_pic_group a set a.PRICE=#{setPrice} where a.GOODS_TYPE=#{pictureType}
mapper.select: SELECT c.COVER_PICTURE_ID as picid, c.SGIN_TIME as sgintime,c.CREATOR,c.TITLE ,p.ALL_PATH as allpath ,a.PICTURE_HEIGHT as pictureheight,a.PICTURE_WIDTH as picturewidth,a.PICTURE_LENGTH as picturelength from cp_pic_group c ,cp_pic_allpath p ,cp_picture a where c.COVER_PICTURE_ID=p.TRAGET_ID and p.PIC_TYPE=2 and c.id=#{id} and c.COVER_PICTURE_ID=a.ID GROUP BY c.SGIN_TIME

SELECT c.COVER_PICTURE_ID as picid, c.SGIN_TIME as sgintime,c.CREATOR,c.TITLE ,p.ALL_PATH as allpath ,a.PICTURE_HEIGHT as pictureheight,a.PICTURE_WIDTH as picturewidth,a.PICTURE_LENGTH as picturelength from cp_pic_group c ,cp_pic_allpath p ,cp_picture a where c.COVER_PICTURE_ID=p.TRAGET_ID and p.PIC_TYPE=#{type} and c.id=#{id} and c.COVER_PICTURE_ID=a.ID GROUP BY c.SGIN_TIME

SELECT a.id as pictureId, c.PRICE as picturePrice, c.SGIN_TIME as publicTime, c.CREATOR as creater , c.TITLE as groupTitle, p.ALL_PATH as allPath , a.GROUP_ID as groupId, c.PRICE_TYPE priceType, a.PICTURE_HEIGHT as pictureHeight, a.PICTURE_WIDTH as pictureWidth, a.PICTURE_LENGTH as pictureLength, a.FILENAME as pictureFilename from cp_pic_group c ,cp_pic_allpath p ,cp_picture a where a.ID=p.TRAGET_ID and p.PIC_TYPE=2 and a.id=#{id} and c.id=a.GROUP_ID GROUP BY c.SGIN_TIME
SELECT ID,GROUP_ID,USER_ID,CREATE_TIME,PUSH_SIGN FROM cp_group_push g WHERE g.GROUP_ID=#{gId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cp_group_push
GROUP_ID,
USER_ID,
PUSH_SIGN,
#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pushSign,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update cp_pic_group a set a.QBSTATUS=1 where a.id=#{gId}
